column4: hey there. i get the error 15 after installing grub2 on my system... I started with LiveCD an tryed update-grub but it says "Cannot find list of partitions." but my /boot/grub/device.map is correct.
who can help me with my grub problem?
i get the error 15. i tried update-grub with a live-cd but it says "cannot find list of partitions!"
